H0.text: Which Frenchman, a football administrator and head of FIFA from 1921 to1954 is regarded as the founder of the football World Cup. Henri Delaunay

H1.text: Which Frenchman, a football administrator and head of FIFA from 1921 to1954 is regarded as the founder of the football World Cup. Gabriel Hanot

H2.text: Which Frenchman, a football administrator and head of FIFA from 1921 to1954 is regarded as the founder of the football World Cup. Charles Simon

H3.text: Which Frenchman, a football administrator and head of FIFA from 1921 to1954 is regarded as the founder of the football World Cup. Jules Rimet

A4.text: On Rimet's initiative, the first FIFA World Cup was held in 1930.

A5.text: He is credited with being the inventor of the World Cup.
